DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted globally. This study describes pharmacogenetic testing of saliva samples from patients who participated in the NN1731-3562 trial (adept™2) (NCT01392547). The objective is to determine the HLA (human leukocyte antigen) type and polymorphisms in the FVII gene in patients previously exposed to rFVIIa analogue.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacogenetic Testing of Saliva Samples From Patients With Five or More Exposure Days to rFVIIa Analogue in the Adept™2 Trial
DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtained before collection of saliva samples Previous participation in adept™2 trial with 5 or more exposure days to rFVIIa analogue
